project.description:
Generate status page for Groovy.
Generated from catkin-rpms/resources/static_jobs. Do not edit on Jenkins but in the repository.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
#stop on error set -o errexit
if [ -e $WORKSPACE/catkin-rpms ] then rm -rf $WORKSPACE/catkin-rpms fi
echo "Fetching catkin-rpms" git clone git://github.com/smd-ros-devel/catkin-rpms.git $WORKSPACE/catkin-rpms -b master --depth 1
export PYTHONPATH=$WORKSPACE/catkin-rpms
echo "Cleaning up" rm -rf $WORKSPACE/groovy_rpm_status
mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/groovy_rpm_status
echo "Generating status page" $WORKSPACE/catkin-rpms/scripts/generate_status_page.py groovy --basedir $WORKSPACE/groovy_rpm_status
echo "Uploading status page" scp $WORKSPACE/groovy_rpm_status/groovy.* rosbuild@csc.mcs.sdsmt.edu:/mnt/storage/ros_build_status/
echo "Done"
